About Me

Hello, I’m Chanyoung Lee, a Master’s student in Automotive Engineering at Hanyang University. I’m interested in Vision AI technologies that enhance the safety and intelligence of autonomous vehicles. Building on my practical experience as a Perception Engineer at Vueron Technology and an AI Researcher Intern at Kakao Mobility, I specialize in bridging the gap between sophisticated AI models and the physical world.

Projects

Vision AI solution for parking lot
• Object Detection, OCR for parking payment system
• Model Optimization for Jetson, Hailo Device (GPU & NPU)
• Object Tracking for parking lot

3D pedestrian detection using LiDAR

• Segmentation, Clustering, Shape Estimation
• 3D bounding box generation, Rule-based SW for pedestrian detection

H-mobility class
• Road Semantic Segmentation, Object Detection using YOLO

Real-time Digital twin with KT group

Self-Driving-Car-Cone-Keeping-Assistance-System
• Sensor fusion (Camera + LiDAR)
• ROS for Perception
• LoRA for E-stop, CAN for steering actuator


EV3 Robot Driving
• Color line detection
• Minimum cost algorithm for path planning
